name: Apes Battle Story
description:
Apes Battle Story is an ultimate action and adventure game in which you play as ape hero to fight for his species and save them from human army. In this survival game you are on the apes family to fight this battle for planet earth. Jail break from the army prison and disappear in amazon jungle. Play as angry ape to fight the war with human forces and become the savior of your species.

Following are the features of the game:
1. The 3D environment
2. Superb Graphics and sounds of the game
3. Easy and user friendly controls of the game.
4. Animations for sounds and army men killing is very realistic.
